roleset.name: get by
roleset.note: COPE-V NOTES: Maybe that's a slang usage. (from cope.01-v)
COPING-N NOTES: Corresponds to cope.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from coping.01-n)
COPING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from coping.01-j)

example.name: with thing coped with
example.text: ``[Our company]-1 has not been able *trace*-1 to cope very effectively with'' changes in the marketplace, said Ryosuke Ito, Sansui's president.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Despite all the pharmaceutical help, John just couldn't cope.

example.name: Both Args
example.text: The company's coping with changes in the marketplace was not very effective.
